name: DailyWordDevotional
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can just say "Alexa, play my DailyWord Devotional". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Find peace in His presence. Follow the DailyWord Devotional, proclaiming the love of God and His call on your life.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
